lines.line_text: THOU hidden Love of GOD, whose Height,
Whose Depth unfathom'd no Man knows,
I see from far thy beauteous Light,
Inly I sigh for thy Repose.
My Heart is pain'd, not can it be
At Rest, till it finds Rest in Thee.

stanzas.stanza_text:
THOU hidden Love of GOD, whose Height,
Whose Depth unfathom'd no Man knows,
I see from far thy beauteous Light,
Inly I sigh for thy Repose.
My Heart is pain'd, not can it be
At Rest, till it finds Rest in Thee.

lines.line_text: Thy secret Voice invites me still
The Sweetness of thy Yoke to prove;
And fain I would: but tho' my Will
Be fixt, yet wide my Passions rove.
Yet Hindrances strew all the Way;
I aim at Thee, yet from Thee stray.
'Tis Mercy all, that Thou hast brought
My Mind to seek her Peace in Thee!
Yet while I seek, but find Thee not,
No Peace my wandring Soul shall see.
O when shall all my Wandrings end,
And all my Steps to Thee-ward tend?

stanzas.stanza_text:
'Tis Mercy all, that Thou hast brought
My Mind to seek her Peace in Thee!
Yet while I seek, but find Thee not,
No Peace my wandring Soul shall see.
O when shall all my Wandrings end,
And all my Steps to Thee-ward tend?

lines.line_text: Is there a Thing beneath the Sun,
That strives with Thee my Heart to share?
Ah tear it thence, and reign alone,
The Lord of ev'ry Motion there:
Then shall my Heart from Earth be free,
When it has found Repose in Thee.

stanzas.stanza_text:
Is there a Thing beneath the Sun,
That strives with Thee my Heart to share?
Ah tear it thence, and reign alone,
The Lord of ev'ry Motion there:
Then shall my Heart from Earth be free,
When it has found Repose in Thee.

lines.line_text: O hide this SELF from me, that I
No more, but CHRIST in me may live!
My vile Affections crucify,
Nor let one darling Lust survive.
In all things nothing may I see,
Nothing desire, or seek but Thee!

stanzas.stanza_text:
O hide this SELF from me, that I
No more, but CHRIST in me may live!
My vile Affections crucify,
Nor let one darling Lust survive.
In all things nothing may I see,
Nothing desire, or seek but Thee!

lines.line_text: O LOVE, thy Sov'reign Aid impart,
To save me from low-thoughted Care:
Chase this Self-will thro' all my Heart,
Thro' all its latent Mazes there.
Make me thy duteous Child, that I
Ceaseless may Abba Father cry.

stanzas.stanza_text:
O LOVE, thy Sov'reign Aid impart,
To save me from low-thoughted Care:
Chase this Self-will thro' all my Heart,
Thro' all its latent Mazes there.
Make me thy duteous Child, that I
Ceaseless may Abba Father cry.

lines.line_text: Ah no! ne'er will I backward turn:
Thine wholly, thine alone I am!
Thrice happy He, who views with Scorn
Earth's Toys for Thee his constant Flame.
O help, that I may never move
From the blest Footsteps of thy Love!

stanzas.stanza_text:
Ah no! ne'er will I backward turn:
Thine wholly, thine alone I am!
Thrice happy He, who views with Scorn
Earth's Toys for Thee his constant Flame.
O help, that I may never move
From the blest Footsteps of thy Love!

lines.line_text: Each Moment draw from Earth away
My Heart, that lowly waits thy Call:
Speak to my inmost Soul, and say
I am thy Love, thy GOD, thy All!
To feel thy Pow'r, to hear thy Voice,
To taste thy Love is all my Choice!

stanzas.stanza_text:
Each Moment draw from Earth away
My Heart, that lowly waits thy Call:
Speak to my inmost Soul, and say
I am thy Love, thy GOD, thy All!
To feel thy Pow'r, to hear thy Voice,
To taste thy Love is all my Choice!
